ch0296_00_nanjamo/0101_0701_01_10:
’Ello, ’ello, hola! Ciao and bonjour! Heeey, if it
isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You’re trending
all over the neighborhood—over all of Pasio!
ch0296_00_nanjamo/0101_0701_02_10:
I hope you’ve got some—bzzzt!—shocking topics
for me to cover again today!
ch0296_00_nanjamo/7101_0701_01_10:
If you’re wonderin’ who I am or what I’m up to,
just watch the Iono Zone and all will be revealed!
ch0296_00_nanjamo/7101_0701_02_10:
My vids are streamed all over the world. Don’t
forget to subscribe to my channel!
ch0296_00_nanjamo/7102_0701_01_10:
There are sooo many famous celebs with
electrifying presences all over Pasio!
ch0296_00_nanjamo/7102_0701_02_10:
Nyahaha! If I collab with them, my view counts’ll
rise like a super-fast Eelektross crawlin’ out of
the ocean!
ch0296_00_nanjamo/7102_0701_03_10: Err, I mean...I’ll make a lot more friendos!
ch0296_00_nanjamo/7103_0701_01_10:
Everywhere I go on this island, I keep findin’ tons
of super-streamable spots!
ch0296_00_nanjamo/7103_0701_02_10:
Hey, do you know about any food or activities on
Pasio that’ll bring in all the likes...or maybe even
go viral?
ch0296_00_nanjamo/7103_0701_03_10:
I wanna do a series of live streams about the best
sights and stuff here for the socials!
ch0296_00_nanjamo/7104_0701_01_10:
If you want folks to remember your name and
face, havin’ a catchy greeting is reeeal important!
ch0296_00_nanjamo/7104_0701_02_10:
C’mon, repeat after me, and make sure you’re
usin’ your outside voice!
ch0296_00_nanjamo/7104_0701_04_10: Right! Now one more time—don’t be shy!
ch0296_00_nanjamo/7105_0701_01_10:
A battle with a super-strong opponent always gets
the sparks flying, don’tcha think?
ch0296_00_nanjamo/7105_0701_02_10:
I see some potential to go viral in you, too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
ch0296_00_nanjamo/7105_0701_03_10:
Err, I mean, if you don’t mind showin’ me your
battlin’ skills, let’s collab!
ch0296_00_nanjamo/1701_0702_01_10:
No need to thank me! You can repay my awesome
generosity by doin’ a collab with me or givin’ me
more sweet, sweet deets about this place!
ch0296_00_nanjamo/2501_0701_01_10: There’s a channel I’ve been checkin’ out lately...
ch0296_00_nanjamo/2501_0701_02_10: They do all sortsa challenges involving Pokémon.
ch0296_00_nanjamo/2501_0701_03_10:
In one episode, they tried to give a goopy, gloppy
Goomy a big ol’ hug. It was HIL-arious!
ch0296_00_nanjamo/2501_0702_01_10: Maybe I should do some Pokémon challenges too...
ch0296_00_nanjamo/2501_0702_02_10:
Wait, no! If I steal somebody else’s content ideas,
the whole internet’ll come after me!
ch0296_00_nanjamo/2511_0701_01_10:
Huh? You wanna know what the one and only
Iono is like in her off-time?
ch0296_00_nanjamo/2511_0701_02_10:
Nope! Nuh-uh! No way! I’m not gonna tell you
somethin’ like that all willy-nilly!
ch0296_00_nanjamo/2511_0701_03_10:
After all, I’m a Gym Leader AND an influencer,
bringin’ dreams to the masses!
ch0296_00_nanjamo/2511_0701_04_10:
I gotta protect my image! You don’t want me to
crush the dreams of all those loyal ladies and
gentlemens who watch me, do ya?
ch0296_00_nanjamo/2511_0702_01_10: But if you really, reeeaaally wanna know...
ch0296_00_nanjamo/2511_0702_02_10:
I’ll spill all the tea about me if you become an
even awesomer, famouser influencer than I am!
ch0296_00_nanjamo/3001_0701_01_10:
’Ello, ’ello, hola! Ciao and bonjour! How’re ya
feelin’ this morning?
ch0296_00_nanjamo/3003_0701_01_10:
In today’s stream, I make the biggest, baddest,
deliciousest sandwich EVER!
ch0296_00_nanjamo/3005_0701_01_10:
Just lookin’ at the island all lit-up-like... Zap!
I got an idea for a gnarly new stream!
